Fogli Forkbeard was a gnome in Raurin in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Fogli Forkbeard had a room at Happy Hogans Desert Igloo in the Sandvoyagers Compound at the time of Khalithariuss release in . He did not often actually sleep in his room. Under the bed, there was a chest marked with his name beneath some clothes, it had 12 pounds of silver and 8 pounds of gold.The amounts in 1 edition are given in coins of different weights for the sake of edition neutrality, the total mass amounts are shown instead of the coin count.
